thread.title: WATCH || John Wall has hilarious reaction to Cousins trade
thread.title_full: WATCH || John Wall has hilarious reaction to Cousins trade

title: WATCH || John Wall has hilarious reaction to Cousins trade
text:
Manage WATCH || John Wall has hilarious reaction to Cousins trade John Wall had a hilarious reaction to his former college teammate DeMarcus Cousins joining Anthony Davis in New Orleans. â€” Troy Machir (@TroyMachir) February 20, 2017 
Count former Wildcat John Wall among those who couldn't believe it when news started to filter out at the NBA All-Star Game in New Orleans that the Sacramento Kings had traded DeMarcus Cousins to the Pelicans. 
When asked about his former college teammate possibly joining All-Star Game MVP Anthony Davis in New Orleans, Wall was at a loss for words. 
Get the latest UK news sent straight to your inbox with out EMAIL NEWSLETTER 
"Whew," Wall said. 
The trade joins two of the league's premier big men and the only players since Shaquille O'Neal to average 27+ points, 10+ rebounds and 1+ blocks per game. 
Asked if that was an unfair pairing, Wall simply nodded his head. 
"I'm just gonna drink on that one," Wall stated plainly. 
Wall, Cousins and Davis all took part in Sunday night's NBA All-Star Game. Wall finished with 12 points, six rebounds and four assists.
